title: Mystery and Crime: The New York Public Library Book of Answers: Intriguing and Entertaining Questions and Answers About the Who's Who and What's
description: From Simon & Schuster, Mystery & Crime is Jay Pearsall's book of answers from The New York Public Library book of answers, offering intriguing and entertaining questions and answers about the who's who and what's what of whodunits.Mystery & Crime is more than one thousand pieces of trivia for mystery, crime, and suspense fans includes teasers about famous authors, favorite characters, and elusive plots.
author: Jay Pearsall
